DOC.detailed_description: The primary research question propose study : Is combination water-based physical exercise + cognitive training program old Veterans amnestic Mild Cognitive Impairment ( MCI ) feasible ? The primary aim propose research : 1 ) demonstrate adequate recruitment retention rate ; 2 ) refinement inclusion/exclusion criterion ; 3 ) refine combination waterbased physical exercise + cognitive training ( WATER+CT ) intervention . These aim test two-phase clinical trial single group design : 1 ) exercise training phase 2 ) cognitive training phase . The exercise training phase consist water-based physical exercise program emphasize cardiovascular fitness strength train combination non-weight bearing exercise include land-based stretch water-based activity . This 2-year pilot project include 50 Veterans diagnose amnestic MCI age 50-90 . The exercise component consist six-month water-based exercise program follow four-week cognitive training program . For first two month water-based exercise program , Veterans come thrice-weekly group session Aquatic Therapy Center VA Palo Alto Health Care System . This transition self-paced exercise program remain four month . After completion exercise program , Veterans begin classroom-based cognitive training VA Palo Alto Health Care System ( VAPAHCS ) .
